Text.val: in order to get the same rsult if the program runs under windows or under I5,
the format in the I/O is set to 'None' and at the end of every line in the form
the - CHR(13) & CHR(10) string was added.
13.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and introduced PI.ADMNO_RATES to fetch proper ADMN_CURRENCY
06.04.2009 Gb SCR14530 got the email address by program GB056, removed part
where the program goes to MSGW if there is no email parameter supplied
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
Switch system language to GB laguage , in which report has to be produced

STP.TXT: GNRD - G E N E R A L D I R E C T O R Y (ENTRY 85) I S E M P T Y

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select
debb_debc_no, debb_admno, debb_clntno, debc_debc, debc_debh, DEBB_ACTINVAH, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING + INVA_ACTASPECIAL),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 ) as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 ) as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVARETENTACCH, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTARETENTION),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVADISPACCH, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTADISPUTES),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTASPECIAL),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVAEXTFINACCH, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAEXTRAFIN),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVAC, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING + INVA_ACTASPECIAL),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVARETENTACCC, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTARETENTION),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVADISPACCC, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTADISPUTES),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCC, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTASPECIAL),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_ACTINVAEXTFINACCC, cast((select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAEXTRAFIN),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )as decimal(13,2)), DEBB_NINVOICESOUTSTANDING, cast((select count(*) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )as decimal(13,2)) from :1/debb join :1/debc on debb_debc_no=debc_no join :1/admn on debb_admno=admn_no where ( (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING + INVA_ACTASPECIAL),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )<>DEBB_ACTINVAH or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )<>DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTARETENTION),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )<>DEBB_ACTINVARETENTACCH or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTADISPUTES),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )<>DEBB_ACTINVADISPACCH or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTASPECIAL),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )<>DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAEXTRAFIN),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )<>DEBB_ACTINVAEXTFINACCH or (select count(*) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO where INVA_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 )<>DEBB_NINVOICESOUTSTANDING or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING + INVA_ACTASPECIAL),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )<>DEBB_ACTINVAC or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )<>DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTARETENTION),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )<>DEBB_ACTINVARETENTACCC or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTADISPUTES),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )<>DEBB_ACTINVADISPACCC or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTASPECIAL),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )<>DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCC or (select coalesce (sum (INVA_ACTAEXTRAFIN),0) from :1/INVA, :1/INVO, :1/CLNT where INVA_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and INVA_NO = INVO_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBB_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBB_CLNTNO )<>DEBB_ACTINVAEXTFINACCC )
for fetch only optimize for 100 row
